channel.title: Kdramas on Lessons in...
channel.description: Recent content in Kdramas on Lessons in...

item.title: Will the Korean Flavour Last?
item.description: Surely you cannot be penalised for having been exposed to all things Korea for over 10 years. As soon as the knives and short hair came out I started singing Cry Cry. The cigarette at the wake gave it away. A nice show but too much of a rehash of Tara’s Cry Cry in 2011. There are many people jumping on the K drama bandwagon post SG, hopefully this will not lead to a bastardisation of the industry.

item.title: Korean Dramas: Where to being?
item.description: Wow you watched Squid Games God Tier Crash Landing on You (2019) Goblin (2016) King: Eternal Monarch (2020) Rooftop Prince (2012) Miss You (2012) Big (2012) Very Good Itaewon Class (2020) Hell is Other People (2019) Signal (2016) Live (2018) Taxi Driver (2021) There’s Something in the Rain (2018) Yumi’s Cells (2021) Did not live up to expectation / Died out AKA Shows containing Bae Suzy Vagabond (2019) Squid Games (2021) Start Up (2020) Sisyphus: The Myth (2021) Mouse (2021) To decide

item.title: Yumi's Cells
item.description: Love from Within A solid romance drama with an original concept. Inspired from a Webtoon the protagonist Kim Yumi has her anthropomorphised cells on show ranging from Huger Cell to Lust Cell. Yumis-Cells.jpg

item.title: True Beauty2
item.description: Love Triangle Academics Beauty Peer Pressure Is love worth dying for? We all have inner demons Squid Games

item.title: Itaewon Class
item.description: How to get revenge… wait and then wait some more Take a peak into the social status hiearchy Yangban. On another day you think you could be watching the revenge tail from Parasite
